description: Analyzes dialog and conversation commands in the game

confidence_guidelines.0.0: Command is not related to dialog or completely unclear
confidence_guidelines.0.3: Command might be related to dialog but very ambiguous
confidence_guidelines.0.5: Command is likely about dialog but target/topic is unclear
confidence_guidelines.0.7: Command is clearly about dialog but might have additional context
confidence_guidelines.0.9: Command is definitely about dialog with clear target and topic
